SR 3 was adopted by the following vote:  29 Yeas, 2 Nays, 1 Present, not voing.

Yeas — Bettencourt; Birdwell; Buckingham; Burton; Campbell; Creighton; Estes, J.; Estes, M.; Hancock; Hinojosa; Huffines; Huffman; Hughes; Kolkhorst; Lucio; Menéndez; Miles; Nelson; Nichols; Perry; Schwertner; Seliger; Taylor of Galveston; Taylor of Collin; Uresti; Watson; West; Whitmire; Zaffirini.

Nays — Garcia; Rodríguez.

Present, not voting — Mr. Speaker(C).

Absent, Excused — Howard; Huberty; Stickland; Zerwas.

Absent — Dukes.
